## Requirement
What do we want? i.e: Build a simple Http Server, similar with FastAPI

### Todo
How do we do it? Example below.

## AC (Acceptance Criteria)
A set of specific, measurable conditions that must be met for a product, feature or user story to be considered complete. Example below.
- [ ] Server should run at `localhost:8000`
- [ ] Display documentation page
- [ ] Server should restart when there's a change in a source file in project
- [ ] Unit tests run successfully
